summary: Integration test suite for the graph manager of a C/C++ package manager, covering extensive dependency graph scenarios including linear chains, multi‑level headers and libraries, diamond‑shaped inheritance, transitive and invisible overrides, missing or cyclic dependencies, and various build configurations (static/shared, header‑only).
business_intent: Ensure the graph resolution engine correctly handles complex package relationships, detects conflicts and loops, and respects build options, thereby preventing build failures and maintaining reliability of the package management system.
